summary.title: E- Commerce Threat Model
summary.description: Threat model for a small e-commerce application using STRIDE

diagrams.title: E-Commerce Threat Model

data.name: Website Users
data.description: End user who browses products and places orders

threats.title: User Identity Spoofing
threats.description: An attacker pretends to be a valid user by stealing or guessing login credentials, gaining unauthorized access to accounts
threats.mitigation: Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA), enforce strong passwords, and add account lockout after repeated failures.

threats.title: Action Repudiation
threats.description: A user denies performing actions such as placing orders or making payments due to missing logs or insufficient tracking.
threats.mitigation: Maintain secure audit logs, timestamped transaction records, and non-repudiation mechanisms (e.g., signed receipts).

data.name:
Web Application 
Server
data.description: Handles business logic, authentication, and API requests

threats.title: API Request Tampering
threats.description: Attackers modify parameters in HTTP or API requests to manipulate prices, bypass checks, or execute unauthorized actions.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Sensitive Data Disclosure
threats.description: Application leaks sensitive data through unmasked error messages, insecure storage, or exposed configuration files.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Service Denial (DoS Attack)
threats.description: High-volume traffic or automated bots overload the web server, causing unavailability for genuine users.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Privilege Escalation Exploit
threats.description: Vulnerable application code or poor access control allows attackers to gain admin privileges on the server.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

data.name: Users Database
data.description: Stores user data, product catalog, orders, and payment info

threats.title: User Data  Altering
threats.description: Attacker can alter the user data in the data base
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

data.name: Payment Gateway
data.description: External payment service (e.g., PayPal, Razorpay, Stripe)

threats.title: Fake Payment Gateway Spoofing
threats.description: Users are redirected to a fake payment page designed to steal card or banking information.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Payment Data Tampering
threats.description: Attackers intercept and modify payment amounts or transaction IDs during transfer between app and gateway.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Payment Information Disclosure
threats.description: Credit card or transaction data exposed if HTTPS/TLS is not enforced or tokenization is missing.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Admin User Identity Spoofing
threats.description: An attacker pretends to be a valid Admin user by stealing or guessing login credentials, gaining unauthorized access to accounts.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Action Repudiation
threats.description: A admin denies performing actions such as Making changes in config file  or any update on website
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Data Tampering in Storage
threats.description: Attackers alter stored data such as order details or user balances, compromising integrity.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Information Disclosure via Injection
threats.description: Poorly sanitized input allows SQL injection, exposing sensitive customer and transaction data.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Database Service Disruption
threats.description: Malicious queries or resource exhaustion cause the database to crash or become unresponsive.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Unauthorized Privilege Access
threats.description: Weak authentication or misconfigured database roles allow attackers to access restricted tables or functions.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

diagrams.description: Threat model for a small e-commerce application using STRIDE
